subject: Desktop Fixed (Shifters) and Carbon Fiber Heel Plate informations.
description_text: Dear Support Service, I just bought a 7+R shifter and an X plus Pedals (with clutch). - The pedals are a bit to high for me and unreachable for my daughter, even when I down them at max. So I would like to add the Carbon Fiber Heel Plate. But I need to know its dimensions especially the position and size of the screw holes : I need to know if it's compatible with my pedals base. Are the screws provides with the Carbon Fiber Heel Plate, if yes what kind of screws please ? - The 7+R shifter is too far away for my daughter, so I think about the Desktop Fixed (Shifters), it seems to fix the shifter from the side, but is it possible with a shifter build in a cylinder ? Best regards. Michael Buet

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael BUET,   Please let me know the model of your rig and send me a photo of it. I can help you confirm whether it supports the elevated pedal base installation — in most cases, it should not be a problem.
